channel.title: CVE Feed for TCMAN -- GIM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TCMAN -- GIM

item.title: CVE-2021-40851|2024-08-04T02:51:07.513Z -- tcman -- gim
item.description: TCMAN GIM is vulnerable to a lack of authorization in all available webservice methods listed in /PC/WebService.asmx. The exploitation of this vulnerability might allow a remote attacker to obtain information.

item.title: CVE-2021-40853|2024-08-04T02:51:07.463Z -- tcman -- gim
item.description: TCMAN GIM does not perform an authorization check when trying to access determined resources. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to access URL that require privileges without having them. The exploitation of this vulnerability might allow a remote attacker to obtain sensible information.

item.title: CVE-2021-40850|2024-08-04T02:51:07.446Z -- tcman -- gim
item.description: TCMAN GIM is vulnerable to a SQL injection vulnerability inside several available webservice methods in /PC/WebService.asmx.

item.title: CVE-2021-40852|2024-08-04T02:51:07.466Z -- tcman -- gim
item.description: TCMAN GIM is affected by an open redirect vulnerability. This vulnerability allows the redirection of user navigation to pages controlled by the attacker. The exploitation of this vulnerability might allow a remote attacker to obtain information.
